actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.
Motion to discharge the Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce rejected in House, roll call #196 (109-272).

official_title: Resolution to disapprove the proposed exemption of residual oil fuel from the mandatory petroleum allocation and price regulations (Energy Action No. 1).

summary.text: Disapproves the exemption of residual oil fuel from the mandatory petroleum allocation and price regulations as proposed in the energy action numbered 1, transmitted to the Congress on March 29, 1976.

titles.title: Resolution to disapprove the proposed exemption of residual oil fuel from the mandatory petroleum allocation and price regulations (Energy Action No. 1).
